item.title: About
item.description: A ray on the streets of San Francisco My name is Ray and I hang out in SF. I’m currently soliciting funding for a research nonprofit. Research training I’m a computational neuroscientist with training in experimental biology and large-scale data engineering. I earned my PhD in Neuroscience from the University of California, San Francisco, where I studied whole-brain dynamics in Caenorhabditis elegans in the labs of Saul Kato and Noelle L’Etoile.
